sql_statement.static: SELECT * FROM xDhcpv6PdoPppoxConfigInfo
SELECT 1 FROM xDhcpv6PdoPppoxConfigInfo

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS xDHCPv6_Port_Summary_Results (Iteration INTEGER, PortName TEXT, IterationMode TEXT, ExpectedSessions INTEGER, ConnectedSuccessCount INTEGER, TotalBoundCount INTEGER, FailedConnectCount INTEGER,  TotalFailedCount INTEGER, RetryCount INTEGER, TotalRetriedCount INTEGER, ConfigRequestRate REAL, SuccSetupRate REAL, BindRate REAL, BindRateTolerance REAL, ElapsedTime REAL)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS xDHCPv6_System_Summary_Results (Iteration INTEGER, IterationMode TEXT, TotalExpectedSessions INTEGER, TotalConnectedSuccessCount INTEGER, TotalBoundCount INTEGER, TotalFailedConnectCount INTEGER, TotalFailedCount INTEGER, TotalRetriedCount INTEGER, TotalRetryCount INTEGER, TotalConfigRequestRate REAL, TotalSuccSetupRate REAL, TotalBindRate REAL, BindRateTolerance REAL, TotalElapsedTime REAL)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS xDHCPv6_Port_Iteration_Results (Iteration INTEGER, PortName TEXT, IterationMode TEXT, ExpectedSessions INTEGER, ConnectedSuccessCount INTEGER, TotalBoundCount INTEGER, FailedConnectCount INTEGER, TotalFailedCount INTEGER, RetryCount INTEGER, TotalRetriedCount INTEGER, ConfigRequestRate REAL, SuccSetupRate REAL, BindRate REAL, BindRateTolerance REAL, ElapsedTime REAL)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS xDHCPv6_System_Iteration_Results (Iteration INTEGER, IterationMode TEXT, TotalExpectedSessions INTEGER, TotalConnectedSuccessCount INTEGER, TotalBoundCount INTEGER, TotalFailedConnectCount INTEGER, TotalFailedCount INTEGER, TotalRetriedCount INTEGER, TotalRetryCount INTEGER, TotalConfigRequestRate REAL, TotalSuccSetupRate REAL, TotalBindRate REAL, BindRateTolerance REAL, TotalElapsedTime REAL)
SELECT 1 FROM xDhcpv6PdoPppoxConfigInfo

Children.Name: Results: Add General Port/System Results Tables

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: Results: Add General Port/System Results Tables

sql_statement.static: SELECT IterCfg.Iteration AS 'Iteration', DPPR.PortName AS 'PortName', IterCfg.IterState AS 'IterationMode', IterCfg.CurrVal AS 'ExpectedSessions', DPPR.ConnectedSuccessCount AS 'ConnectedSuccessCount', DPPR.TotalBoundCount AS 'TotalBoundCount', DPPR.FailedConnectCount AS 'FailedConnectCount', DPPR.TotalFailedCount AS 'TotalFailedCount', DPPR.RetryCount AS 'RetryCount', DPPR.TotalRetriedCount AS 'TotalRetriedCount', dhcpPC.RequestRate AS 'ConfigRequestRate', DPPR.SuccSetupRate AS 'SuccSetupRate', DPPR.BindRate AS 'BindRate', DC.BindRateTolerance AS 'BindRateTolerance', (SELECT MAX(ElapsedTime) FROM Dhcpv6BlockResults) AS 'ElapsedTime' FROM (select Dhcpv6PortResults.ParentHnd, Dhcpv6PortResults.PortName, TotalBoundCount, TotalFailedCount, TotalRetriedCount, RetryCount, SuccSetupRate, BindRate, ConnectedSuccessCount, FailedConnectCount from PppoePortResults JOIN Dhcpv6PortResults where PppoePortResults.PortName == Dhcpv6PortResults.PortName) AS DPPR JOIN Dhcpv6PortConfig AS dhcpPC JOIN xDhcpConfiguration as DC JOIN spirent_methodology_BenchmarkStabilityIteratorCommand AS IterCfg WHERE dhcpPC.Handle == DPPR.ParentHnd

SELECT IterCfg.Iteration AS 'Iteration', IterCfg.IterState AS 'IterationMode', (SELECT SUM(ED.DeviceCount) FROM EmulatedDevice AS ED JOIN Dhcpv6PdBlockConfig AS DBC WHERE ED.Handle == DBC.ParentHnd) AS 'TotalExpectedSessions', SUM(DPPR.ConnectedSuccessCount) AS 'TotalConnectedSuccessCount', SUM(DPPR.TotalBoundCount) AS 'TotalBoundCount', SUM(DPPR.FailedConnectCount) AS 'TotalFailedConnectCount', SUM(DPPR.TotalFailedCount) AS 'TotalFailedCount', SUM(DPPR.RetryCount) AS 'TotalRetryCount', SUM(DPPR.TotalRetriedCount) AS 'TotalRetriedCount', SUM(dhcpPC.RequestRate) AS 'TotalConfigRequestRate', SUM(DPPR.SuccSetupRate) AS 'TotalSuccSetupRate', SUM(DPPR.BindRate) AS 'TotalBindRate', DC.BindRateTolerance AS 'BindRateTolerance', (SELECT MAX(ElapsedTime) FROM Dhcpv6BlockResults) AS 'TotalElapsedTime' FROM (select Dhcpv6PortResults.ParentHnd, Dhcpv6PortResults.PortName, TotalBoundCount, TotalFailedCount, TotalRetriedCount, RetryCount, SuccSetupRate, BindRate, ConnectedSuccessCount, FailedConnectCount from PppoePortResults JOIN Dhcpv6PortResults where PppoePortResults.PortName == Dhcpv6PortResults.PortName) AS DPPR JOIN Dhcpv6PortConfig AS dhcpPC JOIN Dhcpv6PortResults AS dhcpPR JOIN xDhcpConfiguration as DC JOIN spirent_methodology_BenchmarkStabilityIteratorCommand AS IterCfg WHERE dhcpPC.Handle == DPPR.ParentHnd
SELECT * FROM xDHCPv6_Port_Iteration_Results
SELECT * FROM xDHCPv6_System_Iteration_Results

Children.Name: Results: Add Detailed Port Results Tables

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: Results: Add Detailed Port Results Tables

sql_statement.static: SELECT Res.PortName AS 'Port Name', Conf.RequestRate AS 'Configured Request Rate (sessions/s)', Conf.ReleaseRate AS 'Configured Release Rate (sessions/s)', Res.TotalAttemptCount AS 'Attempted Count', Res.TotalBoundCount AS 'Bound Count', Res.TotalReboundCount AS 'Rebound Count', Res.TotalReleasedCount AS 'Released Count', Res.TotalDeclinedCount AS 'Declined Count', Res.TotalRenewedCount AS 'Renewed Count', Res.TotalFailedCount AS 'Failed Count', Res.TotalRetriedCount AS 'Retried Count', Res.AttemptRate AS 'Attempt Rate (sessions/s)', Res.BindRate AS 'Bind Rate (sessions/s)', Res.MinSetupTime AS 'Minimum Setup Time (ms)', Res.MaxSetupTime AS 'Maximum Setup Time (ms)', Res.AvgSetupTime AS 'Average Setup Time (ms)' FROM DHCPv6PortConfig AS Conf, DHCPv6PortResults AS Res, Port AS P WHERE P.Handle == Conf.ParentHnd AND Conf.Handle == Res.ParentHnd

SELECT Res.PortName AS 'Port Name', Conf.ConnectRate AS 'Configured Connect Rate (sessions/s)', Conf.DisconnectRate AS 'Configured Disconnect Rate (sessions/s)', Res.Sessions AS 'Session Count', Res.AttemptedCount AS 'Attempted Count', Res.RetryCount AS 'Retry Count', Res.ConnectedSuccessCount AS 'Successful Connected Count', Res.FailedConnectCount AS 'Failed Connect Count', Res.DisconnectedSuccessCount AS 'Successful Disconnected Count', Res.FailedDisconnectCount AS 'Failed Disconnect Count', (CASE WHEN Conf.EmulationType=='SERVER' THEN 'N/A' ELSE Res.SuccSetupRate END) AS 'Successful Setup Rate (sessions/s)', (CASE WHEN Conf.EmulationType=='SERVER' THEN 'N/A' ELSE Res.MinSetupTime END) AS 'Minimum Setup Time (ms)', (CASE WHEN Conf.EmulationType=='SERVER' THEN 'N/A' ELSE Res.MaxSetupTime END) AS 'Maximum Setup Time (ms)', (CASE WHEN Conf.EmulationType=='SERVER' THEN 'N/A' ELSE Res.AvgSetupTime END) AS 'Average Setup Time (ms)' FROM PppoxPortConfig AS Conf, PppoePortResults AS Res, Port AS P WHERE P.Handle == Conf.ParentHnd AND Conf.Handle == Res.ParentHnd

SELECT Res.PortName AS 'Port Name', Res.Sessions AS 'Session Count', Res.TxPadiCount AS 'Tx PADI Count', Res.RxPadoCount AS 'Rx PADO Count', Res.TxPadrCount AS 'Tx PADR Count', Res.RxPadsCount AS 'Rx PADS Count', Res.RxPadiCount AS 'Rx PADI Count', Res.TxPadoCount AS 'Tx PADO Count', Res.RxPadrCount AS 'Rx PADR Count', Res.TxPadsCount AS 'Tx PADS Count', Res.TxPadtCount AS 'Tx PADT Count', Res.RxPadtCount AS 'Rx PADT Count' FROM PppoxPortConfig AS Conf, PppoePortResults AS Res, Port AS P WHERE P.Handle == Conf.ParentHnd AND Conf.Handle == Res.ParentHnd

SELECT Res.PortName AS 'Port Name', Res.Sessions AS 'Session Count', Res.TxLcpConfigRequestCount AS 'Tx LCP Config Request Count', Res.RxLcpConfigRequestCount AS 'Rx LCP Config Request Count', Res.TxLcpConfigRejectCount AS 'Tx LCP Config Reject Count', Res.RxLcpConfigRejectCount AS 'Rx LCP Config Reject Count', Res.TxLcpConfigAckCount AS 'Tx LCP Config Ack Count', Res.RxLcpConfigAckCount AS 'Rx LCP Config Ack Count', Res.TxLcpConfigNakCount AS 'Tx LCP Config Nak Count', Res.RxLcpConfigNakCount AS 'Rx LCP Config Nak Count', Res.TxLcpTermRequestCount AS 'Tx LCP Terminate Request Count', Res.RxLcpTermRequestCount AS 'Rx LCP Terminate Request Count', Res.TxLcpTermAckCount AS 'Tx LCP Terminate Ack Count', Res.RxLcpTermAckCount AS 'Rx LCP Terminate Ack Count', Res.TxLcpEchoRequestCount AS 'Tx LCP Echo Request Count', Res.RxLcpEchoRequestCount AS 'Rx LCP Echo Request Count', Res.TxLcpEchoReplyCount AS 'Tx LCP Echo Reply Count', Res.RxLcpEchoReplyCount AS 'Rx LCP Echo Reply Count' FROM PppoxPortConfig AS Conf, PppoePortResults AS Res, Port AS P WHERE P.Handle == Conf.ParentHnd AND Conf.Handle == Res.ParentHnd

report.explanation: Authentication and NCP packet statistics per port.

sql_statement.static: SELECT Res.PortName AS 'Port Name', Res.Sessions AS 'Session Count', Res.TxIpv6cpCount AS 'Tx IPv6CP Count', Res.RxIpv6cpCount AS 'Rx IPv6CP Count', Res.TxPapCount AS 'Tx PAP Count', Res.RxPapCount AS 'Rx PAP Count', Res.TxChapCount AS 'Tx CHAP Count', Res.RxChapCount AS 'Rx CHAP Count' FROM PppoxPortConfig AS Conf, PppoePortResults AS Res, Port AS P WHERE P.Handle == Conf.ParentHnd AND Conf.Handle == Res.ParentHnd

SELECT Iteration, CASE WHEN BindRate < (ConfigRequestRate * (100 - BindRateTolerance)/100) THEN 'FAIL' WHEN ExpectedSessions != TotalBoundCount THEN 'FAIL' ELSE 'PASS' END AS 'Verdict', IterationMode AS 'Iteration State', PortName AS 'Port Name', ExpectedSessions AS 'Expected Session Count', TotalBoundCount AS 'DHCP-PD Success Count', ConnectedSuccessCount AS 'PPPoE Success Count', TotalFailedCount AS 'DHCP-PD Failed Count', FailedConnectCount AS 'PPPoE Failed Count', TotalRetriedCount AS 'DHCP-PD Retried Count', RetryCount AS 'PPPoE Retried Count', BindRate AS 'DHCP-PD Bind Rate (sessions/s)', SuccSetupRate as 'PPPoE SetupRate (sessions/s)', ConfigRequestRate AS 'Expected Rate (sessions/s)', BindRateTolerance AS 'Bind Rate Tolerance (%)', ElapsedTime AS 'Elapsed Time (s)' FROM xDHCPv6_Port_Iteration_Results

report_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: All DHCP-PD over PPPoE sessions were bound.
report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: Not all DHCP-PD over PPPoE sessions were bound.

sql_statement.static: SELECT PortName AS 'Port Name', ExpectedSessions AS 'Expected Session Count', TotalBoundCount AS 'DHCP-PD Success Count', ConnectedSuccessCount AS 'PPPoE Success Count', TotalFailedCount AS 'DHCP-PD Failed Count', FailedConnectCount AS 'PPPoE Failed Count', TotalRetriedCount AS 'DHCP-PD Retried Count', RetryCount AS 'PPPoE Retried Count' FROM xDHCPv6_Port_Iteration_Results WHERE (TotalBoundCount != ExpectedSessions)

report_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: All DHCP-PD over PPPoE Bind Rate were within configured threshold of configured rate.
report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: DHCP-PD over PPPoE Bind Rate were not within configured threshold of configured rate.

sql_statement.static: SELECT PortName AS 'Port Name', ExpectedSessions AS 'Expected Session Count', ConfigRequestRate AS 'Expected Rate (sessions/s)', BindRate AS 'DHCP-PD Bind Rate (sessions/s)', SuccSetupRate AS 'PPPoE Setup Rate (sessions/s)', BindRateTolerance AS 'Bind Rate Tolerance (%)' FROM xDHCPv6_Port_Iteration_Results WHERE BindRate < (ConfigRequestRate * (100 - BindRateTolerance)/100)
SELECT 1 FROM xDhcpv6PdoPppoxConfigInfo

Children.Name: Results: Add Iteration Traffic Results to Temp Summary

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: Results: Add Iteration Traffic Results to Temp Summary

sql_statement.static: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS xIterationSigFrameResults (Iteration INTEGER, PortName TEXT, PortHandle INTEGER, GeneratorSigFrameCount INTEGER, AnalyzerSigFrameCount INTEGER)

SELECT (SELECT Iteration FROM spirent_methodology_benchmarkstabilityiteratorcommand) AS 'Iteration', p.Name AS 'PortName', p.Handle AS 'PortHandle', gen.GeneratorSigFrameCount, ana.SigFrameCount AS 'AnalyzerSigFrameCount' FROM GeneratorPortResults AS gen JOIN AnalyzerPortResults AS ana JOIN Port AS p WHERE gen.ParentPort == p.Handle AND ana.ParentPort == p.Handle
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Iteration_Traffic_Results_Summary (Iteration INTEGER, PortName TEXT, PortHandle INTEGER, GeneratorSigFrameCount INTEGER, AnalyzerSigFrameCount INTEGER)

report_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: Tx/Rx Sig Frame Counts were greater than 0.

sql_for_verdict.static: FROM xIterationSigFrameResults WHERE GeneratorSigFrameCount == 0 OR AnalyzerSigFrameCount == 0

sql_statement.static: SELECT Iteration, PortName AS 'Port Name', GeneratorSigFrameCount AS 'Generator Sig Frame Count', AnalyzerSigFrameCount AS 'Analyzer Sig Frame Count' FROM xIterationSigFrameResults WHERE GeneratorSigFrameCount == 0 OR AnalyzerSigFrameCount == 0
SELECT Iteration, PortName, PortHandle, GeneratorSigFrameCount, AnalyzerSigFrameCount FROM xIterationSigFrameResults

ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 4985
ExpProperties.EpDescription: Flag to execute commands to verify traffic results
ExpProperties.EpDisplayName: Backend Enable Verification of Traffic Results

Properties.Name: Description
Properties.Value: Parameters for summary results validation configuration

sql_statement.static: SELECT 1 FROM xDhcpv6PdoPppoxConfigInfo

SELECT EnableStabilityBackoff, IsConverged, ConvergedVal, FoundStableValue, StableValue FROM spirent_methodology_BenchmarkStabilityIteratorCommand WHERE (SELECT Iter.Handle FROM Tag AS Tag, RelationTable AS RT, spirent_methodology_BenchmarkStabilityIteratorCommand AS Iter)

report_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: Converged and stable session count meets the expected session count.
report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: Converged or stable session count is less than the expected session count

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT case when (EnableStabilityBackoff=1 AND FoundStableValue = 0) OR (IsConverged=0) OR (IsConverged=1 AND cast(ConvergedVal as INTEGER)<(select SessionCountThreshold from xDhcpv6PdoPppoxConfigInfo)) OR (FoundStableValue=1 AND cast(StableValue as INTEGER)<(select SessionCountThreshold from xDhcpv6PdoPppoxConfigInfo)) then 0 else 1 end from Dhcp_IteratorEndState

sql_statement.static: SELECT CASE IsConverged WHEN 0 THEN 'Did not converge' ELSE ConvergedVal END AS 'Converged Session Count', CASE FoundStableValue WHEN 0 THEN CASE EnableStabilityBackOff WHEN 0 THEN 'N/A' ELSE 'No stable session count found' END ELSE StableValue END AS 'Stable Session Count', SessionCountThreshold AS 'Session Count Threshold' FROM Dhcp_IteratorEndState, xDhcpv6PdoPppoxConfigInfo
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS DPConfig ('Parameter' VARCHAR(64), 'Value' VARCHAR(64))
insert into DPConfig(Parameter, Value) values('PPP Enable Auto Retry', (select case when EnableAutoRetry=1 then 'TRUE' else 'FALSE' end from PppoeClientBlockConfig))
insert into DPConfig(Parameter, Value) values('PPP Auto Retry Count', (select AutoRetryCount from PppoeClientBlockConfig))
insert into DPConfig(Parameter, Value) values('PPP Enable Echo Request', (select case when EnableEchoRequest=1 then 'TRUE' else 'FALSE' end from PppoeClientBlockConfig))
insert into DPConfig(Parameter, Value) values ('PPP Echo Request Max Attempts', (select MaxEchoRequestAttempts from PppoeClientBlockConfig))
insert into DPConfig(Parameter, Value) values ('PPP Echo Request Frequency (seconds)', (select EchoRequestGenFreq from PppoeClientBlockConfig))
insert into DPConfig(Parameter, Value) values('PPP Enable Auto Fill IPv6', (select case when EnableAutoFillIpv6=1 then 'TRUE' else 'FALSE' end from PppoeClientBlockConfig))
insert into DPConfig(Parameter, Value) values('PPP LCP Config Request Timeout (seconds)', (select LcpConfigRequestTimeout from PppoeClientBlockConfig))
insert into DPConfig(Parameter, Value) values('PPP LCP Config Request Max Attempts', (select LcpConfigRequestMaxAttempts from PppoeClientBlockConfig))
insert into DPConfig(Parameter, Value) values('PPP NCP Config Request Timeout (seconds)', (select NcpConfigRequestTimeout from PppoeClientBlockConfig))
insert into DPConfig(Parameter, Value) values('PPP NCP Config Request Max Attempts', (select NcpConfigRequestMaxAttempts from PppoeClientBlockConfig))
insert into DPConfig(Parameter, Value) values('PPP Authentication', (select Authentication from PppoeClientBlockConfig ))
insert into DPConfig(Parameter, Value) values('PPP Username', (select Username from PppoeClientBlockConfig ))
insert into DPConfig(Parameter, Value) values('PPP Password', (select Password from PppoeClientBlockConfig ))
insert into DPConfig(Parameter, Value) values('Outstanding Session Count', (select SessionOutstanding from PppoxPortConfig limit 1))
insert into DPConfig(Parameter, Value) values('Request Rate (sessions/s)', (select ConnectRate from PppoxPortConfig limit 1))
insert into DPConfig(Parameter, Value) values('Release Rate (sessions/s)', (select DisconnectRate from PppoxPortConfig limit 1))
insert into DPConfig(Parameter, Value) values('Binary Search Maximum Session', (select MaxVal from spirent_methodology_BenchmarkStabilityIteratorCommand))
insert into DPConfig(Parameter, Value) values('Binary Search Minimum Session', (select MinVal from spirent_methodology_BenchmarkStabilityIteratorCommand))
insert into DPConfig(Parameter, Value) values('Binary Search Step Session', (select StepVal from spirent_methodology_BenchmarkStabilityIteratorCommand))

insert into DPConfig(Parameter, Value) values('Enable Stability Backoff', (select case when EnableStabilityBackoff=1 then 'TRUE' else 'FALSE' end from spirent_methodology_BenchmarkStabilityIteratorCommand))
insert into DPConfig(Parameter, Value) values('Stability Success Percent (%)', (select successpercent from spirent_methodology_BenchmarkStabilityIteratorCommand))
insert into DPConfig(Parameter, Value) values('Stability Repeat Count', (select repeatcount from spirent_methodology_BenchmarkStabilityIteratorCommand))
select Parameter as 'Parameter', Value as 'Configured Value'  from DPConfig

Children.Name: Results: Verify DB Query (Report table for converged/final value)

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: Results: Verify DB Query (Report table for converged/final value)

Properties.Name: SqlQuery
Properties.Value: SELECT CASE IsConverged WHEN 0 THEN 'Did not converge' ELSE ConvergedVal END AS 'Converged Session Count', CASE FoundStableValue WHEN 0 THEN CASE EnableStabilityBackOff WHEN 0 THEN 'N/A' ELSE 'No stable session count found' END ELSE StableValue END AS 'Stable Session Count', CurrVal AS 'Final Session Count' FROM spirent_methodology_BenchmarkStabilityIteratorCommand

Properties.Name: FailedVerdictExplanation
Properties.Value: Failed to report Test Summary Results

sql_statement.static: SELECT 1 FROM xDhcpv6PdoPppoxConfigInfo

SELECT Iteration, CASE WHEN TotalBindRate < (TotalConfigRequestRate * (100 - BindRateTolerance)/100) THEN 'FAIL' WHEN TotalExpectedSessions != TotalBoundCount THEN 'FAIL' ELSE 'PASS' END AS 'Verdict', IterationMode AS 'Test Phase', TotalExpectedSessions AS 'Total Expected Session Count', TotalBoundCount AS 'Total DHCP-PD Success Count', TotalConnectedSuccessCount AS 'Total PPPoE Success Count', TotalFailedCount AS 'Total DHCP-PD Failed Count', TotalFailedConnectCount AS 'Total PPPoE Failed Count', TotalRetriedCount AS 'Total DHCP-PD Retried Count', TotalRetryCount AS 'Total PPPoE Retried Count', TotalConfigRequestRate AS 'Total Request Rate (sessions/s)', TotalBindRate AS 'Total DHCP-PD Bind Rate (sessions/s)', TotalSuccSetupRate AS 'Total PPPoE Setup Rate (sessions/s)', TotalElapsedTime AS 'Total Elapsed Time (s)' FROM xDHCPv6_System_Summary_Results

report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: No Port Summary Results were found.

sql_statement.static: SELECT Iteration, CASE WHEN BindRate < (ConfigRequestRate * (100 - BindRateTolerance)/100) THEN 'FAIL' WHEN ExpectedSessions != TotalBoundCount THEN 'FAIL' ELSE 'PASS' END AS 'Verdict', IterationMode AS 'Test Phase', PortName AS 'Port', ExpectedSessions AS 'Expected Session Count', TotalBoundCount AS 'DHCP-PD Success Count', ConnectedSuccessCount AS 'PPPoE Success Count', TotalFailedCount AS 'DHCP-PD Failed Count', FailedConnectCount AS 'PPPoE Failed Count', TotalRetriedCount AS 'DHCP-PD Retried Count', RetryCount AS 'PPPoE Retried Count', ConfigRequestRate AS 'Configured Request Rate (sessions/s)', BindRate AS 'DHCP-PD Bind Rate (sessions/s)', SuccSetupRate AS 'PPPoE Setup Rate (sessions/s)', ElapsedTime AS 'Elapsed Time (s)' FROM xDHCPv6_Port_Summary_Results

report_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: Tx/Rx Frame Counts were greater than 0.
report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: Detected 0 Tx and/or Rx Frame Count.

sql_for_verdict.static: FROM Iteration_Traffic_Results_Summary WHERE GeneratorSigFrameCount == 0 OR AnalyzerSigFrameCount == 0

sql_statement.static: SELECT Iteration, PortName AS 'Port Name', GeneratorSigFrameCount AS 'Generator Sig Frame Count', AnalyzerSigFrameCount AS 'Analyzer Sig Frame Count' FROM Iteration_Traffic_Results_Summary WHERE GeneratorSigFrameCount == 0 OR AnalyzerSigFrameCount == 0

ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 5392
ExpProperties.EpDescription: Flag to execute sql operations to validate Traffic iteration results failures for Summary report
ExpProperties.EpDisplayName: Backend Enable Verification for Summary of Traffic Iteration Results Failures

Frontend.Name: StmExposedProperty 1191
Frontend.EpDescription: DHCP-PD over PPPoE clients' VLAN Mode

Frontend.Name: StmExposedProperty 1499
Frontend.EpDescription: Load Units for IPv6 Traffic load

Frontend.Name: StmExposedProperty 8018
Frontend.EpDescription: Maximum number of sessions in progress, which includes the sessions in the process of coming up or disconnecting at one time

ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 9
ExpProperties.EpDescription: Group of ports on the client side of the topology

ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 10
ExpProperties.EpDescription: Port on the traffic source side of the topology
